title: Club Ownership Still Bugged
body: So I'm owner of a club with over ten people that can all access the club chat but me. My club tag is there and I'm seen as owner to everyone else, yet I am unable to access or be removed from the club. Has anybody found a solution? I've writren a ticket asking them to transfer ownership to a friend but Riot deemed it impossible. Any solutions besides creating a new club?

replies.body: There was a [club outage](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016) that disabled some club leaders from seeing their club, but this should be resolved.  Your previous ticket was while we were still investigating the issue.  Hit us up in a new [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look and see what the deal is with your specific case.  We'll get back to you!
